languages.text: "Ты намерен дать творению из-за вуали исполнить то, ради чего она была создана?" {n}Ирлиэт потрясенно смотрит на Хейнрикса.{/n} "Разве не должен ты оберегать своих соплеменников от происков и соблазнов Сай'лантреш?"

"You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"
languages.original_text: "Ты намерен дать творению из-за вуали исполнить то, ради чего она была создана?" {n}Ирлиэт потрясенно смотрит на Хейнрикса.{/n} "Разве не должен ты оберегать своих соплеменников от происков и соблазнов Сай'лантреш?"

traits.locale_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Allez-vous réellement laisser une création du monde immatériel faire ce pour quoi elle a été conçue ? {n}demande Yrliet en dévisageant Heinrix avec incrédulité.{/n} Votre vocation n'est-elle pas de protéger votre peuple des stratagèmes et des tentations de Sai'lanthresh ? »
languages.original_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: « Allez-vous réellement laisser une création du monde immatériel faire ce pour quoi elle a été conçue ? {n}demande Yrliet en dévisageant Heinrix avec incrédulité.{/n} Votre vocation n'est-elle pas de protéger votre peuple des stratagèmes et des tentations de Sai'lanthresh ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「ヴェールの彼方から来た創造物に本来の役割を果たさせるつもりなのか？」{n}ユリエットは驚いてハインリックスを見つめる。{/n}「セランスレッシュの陰謀や誘惑から同族を守ることが、お前の使命ではないのか？」
languages.original_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴェールの彼方から来た創造物に本来の役割を果たさせるつもりなのか？」{n}ユリエットは驚いてハインリックスを見つめる。{/n}「セランスレッシュの陰謀や誘惑から同族を守ることが、お前の使命ではないのか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你真的打算让来自帷幕之外的造物完成它原本的使命吗？”{n}伊莉耶特震惊地盯着海因里希。{/n}“你的使命不是要保护你的族人，让他们免受赛·兰斯雷什的阴谋与诱惑所害吗？”
languages.original_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: “你真的打算让来自帷幕之外的造物完成它原本的使命吗？”{n}伊莉耶特震惊地盯着海因里希。{/n}“你的使命不是要保护你的族人，让他们免受赛·兰斯雷什的阴谋与诱惑所害吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr wollt eine Schöpfung von jenseits des Schleiers tun lassen, wofür sie erschaffen wurde?" {n}Yrliet starrt Heinrix erstaunt an.{/n} "Ist es denn nicht Eure Berufung, Eure Spezies vor Sai'lanthreshs Intrigen und Versuchungen zu beschützen?"
languages.original_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt eine Schöpfung von jenseits des Schleiers tun lassen, wofür sie erschaffen wurde?" {n}Yrliet starrt Heinrix erstaunt an.{/n} "Ist es denn nicht Eure Berufung, Eure Spezies vor Sai'lanthreshs Intrigen und Versuchungen zu beschützen?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Vas a dejar que una creación de más allá del velo haga aquello para lo que está diseñada?». {n}Yrliet mira asombrada a Heinrix.{/n} «¿No se supone que tu cometido es proteger a tu gente de los planes y las tentaciones de Sai'lanthresh?».
languages.original_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Vas a dejar que una creación de más allá del velo haga aquello para lo que está diseñada?». {n}Yrliet mira asombrada a Heinrix.{/n} «¿No se supone que tu cometido es proteger a tu gente de los planes y las tentaciones de Sai'lanthresh?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Örtünün ardından gelen bir yaratığın amacına ulaşmasına müsaade mi edeceksin?" {n}Yrliet, Heinrix'in şaşkınlığını izliyor.{/n} "Vazifen, soydaşlarını Sai'lanthresh'in düzen ve ayartılarından korumak değil midir?"
languages.original_text: "You intend to let a creation from beyond the veil do what it was designed to do?" {n}Yrliet stares at Heinrix in astonishment.{/n} "Is it not your calling to protect your kind from the schemes and temptations of Sai'lanthresh?"

traits.locale_text: “Örtünün ardından gelen bir yaratığın amacına ulaşmasına müsaade mi edeceksin?” {n}Yrliet, Heinrix’in şaşkınlığını izliyor.{/n} “Vazifen, soydaşlarını Sai'lanthresh’in düzen ve ayartılarından korumak değil midir?”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
